articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Emergency Enlarged Meeting of WPK Central Military Commission
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Emergency Enlarged Meeting of WPK Central Military Commission
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The situation of the country is now inching close to the brink of a war due to the continued anti-DPRK political and military provocations by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces.
					 The broadcasting for anti-DPRK psychological warfare, resumed by the south Korean puppet military gangsters in all sectors of the front under the pretext of doubtful "mine explosion" case which occurred in the demilitarized zone of the western sector of the front on August 4, is still going on day and night. And the leaflet-scattering operation against the DPRK, kicked off with mobilization of die-hard reactionary organizations, has gone beyond a tolerance limit.
					
					 Psychological warfare against the DPRK is, in essence, an open act of war against it.
					
					 In this regard, the General Staff of the Korean People's Army on August 20 sent an ultimatum to the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense that a strong military action would be launched at once unless it stops the anti-DPRK broadcasting for psychological warfare and remove all psywar means within 48 hours.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean puppet military gangsters getting frantic in provoking the DPRK again invented a case of "shell fired by the north" in the afternoon of August 20, Juche 104 (2015) and, under that pretext, fired dozens of shells on the DPRK's inviolable territory, a reckless military action.

articles.title: Greetings to Burundian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Burundian President
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Pierre Nkurunziza upon his reelection as president of Burundi. 
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Burundi will grow stronger, the message wished the Burundian president success in his responsible work for the national reconciliation and unity.

articles.title: Spokesman for Institute for American Institute of DPRK FM on Aggressive Nature of U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Spokesman for Institute for American Institute of DPRK FM on Aggressive Nature of U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Institute for American Studies of the DPRK Foreign Ministry in a statement on Friday exposed the aggressive nature and danger of the large-scale joint military exercises staged by the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces several times every year.
					 Army of any country stages drills but they vary in their nature in the light of their purpose, scenario, place, scale, operation mode and equipment involved, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK has never taken a serious note of the military drills staged by the U.S. in its mainland or Pacific, the places which do not pose any threat to the DPRK.
					
					 But the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises are different from those drills.
					
					 They pose particularly serious danger unlike ordinary military drills as they are large-scale rehearsals for a war of aggression being staged by the U.S., the biggest nuclear power in the world, in areas close to the DPRK.
					
					 5 000 troops of 11 countries are involved in the "quick reaction 15" joint military drill of NATO, the largest-ever since the Cold War, which is now under way in Europe. But at least 30 000 U.S. troops and more than 50 000 puppet troops of south Korea are now involved in the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises. This clearly proves their dangerous nature.
					
					 This is clear from the fact that the war drills are focused on landing operations and commando operations aimed at making a surprise attack on the DPRK and "occupying Pyongyang." The distance of the  targets set by the U.S. from theatres of drills clearly proves that the U.S. seeks to bring down the DPRK after throwing away the signboard called "defensive drill" in a moment when an opportunity presents itself.
					
					 The danger of war exercises will never decrease when they bring a "visiting group" to such terror-ridden theatre of war rehearsals.
					
					 It is nonsensical for the U.S. to compare the aggressive and provocative joint war exercises it stages together with the south Korean puppet forces with huge armed forces including preemptive nuclear strike means involved in areas very close to the DPRK, its belligerent party,  with the Korean People's Army's independent military drill conducted in its land.
					
					 The U.S. assertion that it cannot stop the joint war exercises as it has staged them for more than 40 years can convince no one.
					
					 The U.S. had halted Team Spirit joint military exercises according to the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework in 1992, the north-south agreement on non-aggression and a joint declaration on denuclearization were adopted and took effect on the Korean Peninsula that year and the safeguards accord was signed between the DPRK and the International Atomic Energy Agency, making noticeable progress in ensuring peace.
					
					 It is self-contradictory for the U.S. to insist it cannot stop the military exercises as they have long been staged, while ignoring such historical facts.
					
					 The DPRK government is more strongly opposed to the joint military exercises now because their aggressive nature has gone beyond tolerance limit.
					
					 In those days when the joint military exercises were staged at the end of the 1960s the U.S. claimed that their purpose was to conduct drills for hurling its troops in contingency on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Such drills have turned into very provocative and aggressive war maneuvers aimed to "remove the headquarters of the DPRK" and "occupy Pyongyang" after the lapse of more than four decades.
					
					 The U.S. brought to light its ever more undisguised hostile intent to bring down the social system of the DPRK over the "human rights" issue recently and even its president unhesitatingly talked about the "collapse of the social system." Such reality makes the DPRK further raise vigilance against the aggressive and dangerous nature of the joint military drills and hardens its will not to allow such war drills any longer.
					
					 The situation in the area along the Military Demarcation Line has now reached the brink of war due to the military provocations of the south Korean puppet forces. This is a natural product of the hostile policy pursued by the U.S. to fan up the confrontation hysteria of the puppet forces through dangerous war maneuvers.
					
					 To halt the joint military maneuvers, the most vivid manifestation of the hostile policy towards the DPRK, or not will be a touchstone judging whether the U.S. is going to seek a peaceful solution of the Korean issue or not.

articles.title: DPRK FM on Situation That Reached Brink of War
articles.content:
DPRK FM on Situation That Reached Brink of War
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- As already reported, the south Korean puppet forces perpetrated again such grave military provocation as firing dozens of shells into the area of the DPRK's side in the area along the Military Demarcation Line on Thursday.
					 The DPRK Foreign Ministry said in a statement on Friday in this connection:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces claimed before any others that they made a retaliatory firing because the DPRK's side fired one shell first, but this was a completely sheer lie and fabrication.
					
					 On Thursday the DPRK's side clarified that it did not fire even a single bullet or single shell at the enemy's side first nor it made any accidental firing.
					
					 The recent shelling incident unilaterally committed by the south Korean puppet forces was neither incidental nor an accident but a carefully calculated provocation committed by themselves.
					
					 It is a trite method of the successive south Korean rulers to cook up a shocking incident in the area along the MDL whenever they face a crisis in a bid to divert the attention of public at home and abroad elsewhere and seek a way out of it.
					
					 The recent incident was an undisguised provocation aimed to tide over their crisis, get breathing spell and strain the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension and thus spoil other's festival.
					
					 The enemy cooked up the "mine explosion" case in an area along the Military Demarcation Line and resumed broadcasting for psychological warfare against the north under that pretext in a bid to rattle its nerve to the worst extent, while staging large-scale joint military exercises together with the U.S. By escalating the tension this way, they carried out the artillery firing after creating psychological situation to make the international community think the DPRK's side might fire one shell first and are now insisting it was "firing in retaliation" against the former's  shelling.
					
					 However, the enemy were seriously mistaken this time.
					
					 They tried to divert elsewhere the attention of the world people through the shelling, becoming unable to escape the fate of perishing in the flames kindled by themselves.
					
					 The General Staff of the Korean People's Army sent an ultimatum to the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense at 17:00, Pyongyang time, on August 20 that a strong military action would be launched unless it stops the anti-DPRK broadcasting for psychological warfare and dismantles all psywar means within 48 hours.
					
					 The Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea examined and ratified the offensive operation plan of the KPA Front Command to launch retaliatory strike and counterattack on the whole length of the front all at once. It also approved the decision of the KPA General Staff in which it sent an ultimatum to the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un issued an order of the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army that the frontline large combined units of the KPA should enter a wartime state to be fully battle ready to launch surprise operations and the area along the front be put in a semi-war state from 17:00 on Friday.
					
					 The situation which has reached the brink of war is now hardly controllable.
					
					 We have exercised our self-restraint for decades.
					
					 Now no one's talk about self-restraint is helpful to putting the situation under control.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are poised not to just counteract or make any retaliation but not to rule out an all-out war to protect the social system, their own choice, at the risk of their lives.

articles.title: Briefing on Prevailing Situation in DPRK
articles.content:
Briefing on Prevailing Situation in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A briefing on the prevailing situation in Korea was held at the People's Palace of Culture here on Friday.
					 Present there were diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international bodies to the DPRK and military attaches and staff members of foreign embassies and foreign correspondents here.
					
					 Army General Kim Yong Chol, vice-chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army and director of its General Reconnaissance Bureau, informed of the situation in Korea which was inching close to the brink of war due to the ceaseless anti-DPRK political and military provocations by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces and of the truth about their shameless smear campaign. 
					
					 He said:
					
					 Amid the intensified anti-DPRK moves of the south Korean puppet forces at the instigation of the United States in August, the puppet military war maniacs cooked up the case of "shelling by the north" in the afternoon of August 20 and, under this pretext, committed such grave military provocation as firing 36 shells at KPA civil police posts.
					
					 The case is a groundless intrigue and fabrication.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces invented the "mine explosion" case, a "provocation by the north", in bid to shift the blame for the present bedeviled north-south relations onto the DPRK and justify such moves for confrontation among compatriots as an anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operation.
					
					 The psychological warfare against the DPRK is, in essence, the most undisguised action for aggression on it.
					
					 Under the prevailing grave situation, an emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea was convened at night of August 20. At the meeting the KPA Supreme Commander issued an order that the KPA frontline large combined units should enter a wartime state, fully armed to launch surprise operations and the area along the front be put in a semi-war state from 17:00 of August 21.
					
					 The reckless provocation by the enemies deserves severe punishment, he said, and went on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are closely watching the ceaselessly and recklessly confrontational hysteria of the provocateurs.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces should behave themselves, squarely seeing the reality.
					
					 The world will clearly see how the DPRK army and people will shatter the confrontation moves of the aggressors, provocateurs.

articles.title: Working People in DPRK Get Fully Ready for War
articles.content:
Working People in DPRK Get Fully Ready for War
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- An emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea was convened at Thursday night to cope with the reckless anti-DPRK military provocations by the south Korean puppet group of traitors.
					 The news makes all the servicepersons and civilians in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea harden their will to take thousand-fold revenge upon the provokers.
					
					 A bitter lesson should be given with arms to the confrontation maniacs--this is the strong demand of all the DPRK people at present.
					
					 The working citizens are now in high spirits to further accelerate the socialist construction in all sectors of society while keeping themselves on the alert and thus display the heroic stamina of Songun (military-first) Korea. It is their stand that the socialist construction should be continued until midnight today even if a war may break out tomorrow.
					
					 Emergency measures are taken to speed up the production and construction in every sector of the national economy with a mind to annihilate the provokers at once.
					
					 Meanwhile, all the working civilians are making full combat readiness to go over into action if the enemies dare attack the DPRK.

articles.title: KPA Units Wind up Preparations for Military Action
articles.content:
KPA Units Wind up Preparations for Military Action
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the news of recent emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and the urgent report of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, all the servicepersons are burning their hearts with the unshakable will to annihilate the enemy.
					 On orders of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, the KPA frontline large combined units entered into a wartime state all at once, fully armed to launch surprise operations, and wound up their preparedness for action.
					
					 Now, the KPA soldiers wait for an order of attack to destroy the war maniacs who are getting hell-bent on the anti-DPRK moves, oblivious of their past defeat.
					
					 The enemy's provocation bases and anti-DPRK propaganda bases and means for psywar are within the sight of the KPA's multiple rocket launchers and tactical and strategic rocket forces.
					
					 Meanwhile, all the civic units in the frontline zone have gone into a semi-war system.
					
					 They are now speeding up the production and construction while keeping themselves in combat posture.

articles.title: DPRK Servicepersons Brace for Retaliation to Provokers
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons Brace for Retaliation to Provokers
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The situation on the Korean peninsula is now inching close to the brink of a war due to the reckless provocations made by the south Korean military war hawks in the central western sector of the front.
					 To cope with this war crisis, all men and officers of the frontline large combined units of the Korean People's Army have gone into a wartime state under the KPA Front Command's offensive operation plan ratified at the recent emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They are filled with the unshakable will to defend the country and punish the provokers.
					
					 Kim Chung Ryol, a KPA officer, told KCNA:
					
					 The Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to ignite a new war against the DPRK, enrage us servicepersons.
					
					 Our arms do not show mercy to any provokers who infringe upon the sovereignty and security of socialist Korea and its people and disturb peace.
					
					 Our revolutionary armed forces will surely bring the provokers to their final doom if they continue to go reckless.
					
					 Jong Hak Chol, a KPA soldier, said:
					
					 It is quite natural to return a retaliatory war of justice for reckless military provocation.
					
					 We, servicepersons, are burning our hearts with the strong will to wipe out the war provocateurs and achieve the country's reunification without fail.
					
					 If the enemies do not stop the anti-DPRK propaganda broadcasting within 48 hours, all their psywar means will be reduced into ashes by our modern striking means.

articles.title: Construction Field of Power Station Seething with Spirit of Annihilating Enemies
articles.content:
Construction Field of Power Station Seething with Spirit of Annihilating Enemies
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The report on the emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the urgent report of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) inspire the army and people of the DPRK with the spirit of annihilating enemies.
					 In this spirit, builders of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station are performing great labor feats as the times go by.
					
					 Jon Kum Hyang, one of woman builders, told KCNA:
					
					 I have overfulfilled my daily quota by 1.7 times today with the hatred to enemies. If a war breaks out, I will rush to the fields of decisive battle. In the spirit of taking thousand-fold revenge on the enemies, I will work harder and harder to speed up the construction of the power station.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Youth League in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Youth League in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation to mark the 60th anniversary of the formation of the Korean Youth League in Japan led by Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the youth league, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They looked round historic relics preserved with much care at his old home in Mangyongdae, being briefed on his revolutionary history and the patriotic life of his family members.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said:
					
					 I came to keenly feel once more the undying immortal exploits the President performed by dedicating himself to the country and people all his life.
					
					 We will discharge our responsibility and duty in the drive to usher in a new heyday of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Munsu Water Park, etc.

articles.title: Youths and Students Meet
articles.content:
Youths and Students Meet
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting of youths and students took place at the Central Youth Hall on Friday to celebrate the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that thanks to the day when Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership, the sacred revolutionary history and traditions, which was hewed out by arms in the forests of Mt. Paektu and has triumphantly advanced, are being given steady continuity and a new turning point was made in strengthening the revolutionary armed forces and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. They went on:
					
					 In the mid-1990s the leader frustrated the imperialist allied forces' moves to invade the DPRK, created the myth of victory in the war without gunfire unprecedented in the world history of wars and firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country.
					
					 Thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, another peerlessly Songun brilliant commander, the Songun idea and exploits of Kim Jong Il are being brilliantly carried forward and the revolutionary cause of Juche that started on Mt. Paektu is making steady advance.
					
					 Recently the situation of the country is inching close to the brink of war due to the constant political and military provocations against the DPRK perpetrated by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces. In active response to the spirit of the emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, youths and students should turn out in the just and sacred war for defeating the aggressors and provokers at a blow and devote the patriotic blood to it.
					
					 All officials and members of the youth league should unite more firmly behind Kim Jong Un and struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the youth league, youths and students.

articles.title: Performance Reflecting Faith and Will of Korean Young Vanguard Held
articles.content:
Performance Reflecting Faith and Will of Korean Young Vanguard Held 
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A performance by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was given at the Central Youth Hall Friday to celebrate the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as female trio "Happiness of Being under the Care of Respected Supreme Commander" and trumpet duet and male pangchang "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu".
					
					 The performers highly praised the feats of Kim Jong Il who provided an eternal foundation for prosperity and happiness for all ages by leading the Korean revolution to victory with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers helping look back upon the devotion and efforts of Kim Jong Il who put the country's dignity and national power into the highest stage by making a long journey for Songun leadership.
					
					 Put on the stage were also numbers reflecting the will of the young vanguard to devote themselves to the triumphant advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance clearly demonstrated the faith and will of five million young vanguard to mercilessly punish with the arms of justice enemies running amuck to do harm to the DPRK once Kim Jong Un issues an order.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, etc.

articles.title: Officials, Members of Women's Union Meet Women Active in Assisting Army
articles.content:
Officials, Members of Women's Union Meet Women Active in Assisting Army
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting with women active in assisting the army took place at the Central Youth Hall on Friday.
					 Speeches were made there by women active in Pyongyang City in assisting the army.
					
					 Pak Ryu Sun, resident in Chukjon-dong No. 1, Mangyongdae District, said she would continue assisting the army, always remembering the loving care and benevolence of the peerlessly great persons who awarded a gold star medal of hero to her son fallen in the battle against the enemies and made him enjoy an eternal life at the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery with the hero soldiers in the 1950s.
					
					 Ho Hye Sun, resident in Sanop-dong No. 2, Songyo District, said that she positively assisted the People's Army for at least 20 years.
					
					 Kim Kum Nyo, resident in Chungsong-dong No. 1, Rangnang District, renewed her resolution to bring up all her children to be human bullet and bomb fighters devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 Kim Thuk Sil, worker of Chilgol Restaurant, stressed that the People's Army would become stronger and happiness and future of the motherland would be firmly guaranteed when everyone assists the army with patriotic mind and noble civic consciousness.
					
					 Kim Ok Ran, chairwoman of a primary committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) in Sungri-dong No. 3, Rangnang District, so far devoted her sincerity to the soldiers and special class disabled soldiers and dynamically assisted the army.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the women's union, Kim Jin Ha, secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the women's union and its members in the city.

articles.title: 41st National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
articles.content:
41st National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The 41st National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize closed with due ceremony at the hall of the youth league on Friday.
					 The contest took place in Pyongyang, Phyongsong City of South Phyongan Province, Hamhung of South Hamgyong Province and Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province. The contest was held divided into senior secondary, junior secondary and primary schools. They competed in 17 events including basketball, volleyball, table-tennis, Taekwon-Do and Ssirum (Korean wrestling).
					
					 Pyongyang City came first in team standing.
					
					 Forty players were selected as April 18 best players.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned and teachers of specialized sports groups.

articles.title: WIPO Medals and Certificates Awarded to DPRK Inventors
articles.content:
WIPO Medals and Certificates Awarded to DPRK Inventors
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Medals and certifications of the WIPO (World Intellectual Property Organization) were recently awarded to inventors of the DPRK.
					 They invented the near infrared spectrum analyzer, technology for producing salt from underground ultra-saline water, capsule of nutriments extracted from flax, bean and medical herbs and its manufacturing method.       
					
					 The near infrared spectrum analyzer makes a fast and highly accurate assay of different organic ingredients contained in sample.
					
					 The technology for producing salt from underground ultra-saline water is of great profitability.
					
					 Nutritious flax-bean capsule is a functional health foodstuff efficacious against mastopathy, early breast cancer and other mammary diseases.

articles.title: Another Document on Sexual Slavery of Japan Disclosed
articles.content:
Another Document on Sexual Slavery of Japan Disclosed 
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Another document proving sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, hideous crime against humanity, was disclosed. 
					 A document of the then puppet state of Manchuria in the 1940s disclosed the fact that the Imperial Japanese Army drafted about 2 000 Korean women as sexual slaves at a time, according to the south Korean Yonhap News on August 17. 
					
					 The Japanese imperialists installed "comfort stations for soldiers" in the Mudanjiang and other parts of China in October 1941 to force a lot of Korean women to provide sex. 
					
					 The Japanese imperialists deceived Korean women, saying that they would work in "cook-shops for the Japanese army" to make them sexual slaves. 
					
					 The above-said document referred in detail to the installing process and dates of the "comfort stations" disguised as "cook-shops" and time of sexual service and objects. It fully shows craftiness, shamelessness and moral vulgarity of Japan which desperately tried to cover up the sexual slavery in the past. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese authorities denied Japan's crime of sexual slavery, letting loose reckless remarks insulting the victims as "prostitutes" and "cooperators for the Japanese army". 
					
					 Japan can never erase or rewrite the history no matter how desperately it may try to cover up the crime of aggression committed against the Korean nation and paint itself as a "contributor to peace". 
					
					 Japan should opt for settling the past crimes, not covering up the crimes including the hideous crimes against the Korean people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Self-Defensive Measure for Defending Sovereignty of Country
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Self-Defensive Measure for Defending Sovereignty of Country
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military hooligans started frantic large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills targeted against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. Therefore, an extreme tension prevails on the Korean peninsula by which a war may break out any time.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The joint military drills are little short of an open declaration of a war against the DPRK as they are an unprecedented military provocation in light of their scale, nature and program.
					
					 The south Korea-U.S. combined division is being involved in the drills whose operational mission is to "remove the headquarters" and "occupy Pyongyang". The war drills are getting into full swing day by day now that all operational commands have been deployed.
					
					 No one can vouch when such provocative and dangerous saber-rattling against the north would lead to a total war.
					
					 It is the sinister intention of the U.S. and the puppet forces to persistently push the situation to the phase of a war, using the incident of "mine explosion" as a pretext of waging joint military drills.
					
					 Owing to the action of the U.S. and the puppet military hooligans, the outbreak of a nuclear war has become a matter of time on the peninsula with the nation's destiny exposed to constant threat.
					
					 The target of the joint military drills is to hurt the dignified social system of the DPRK by force of arms. Therefore, it is an inviolable right of the DPRK to take self-defensive measures one after another to defend its sovereignty and supreme interests. 
					
					 The recent statement issued by a spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK solemnly declared that its military counteraction will increase as the joint military drills gets intensified. This is not an empty talk.

articles.title: KPA's Ultimatum Is Not Just Warning: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
KPA's Ultimatum Is Not Just Warning: KCNA Commentary
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The worst touch-and-go situation was created on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The warlike developments such as crossfire, broadcasting for psychological warfare and scattering of leaflets in peace time throw into uneasiness Northeast Asia including the peninsula.
					
					 What is the cause and who spearheads it?
					
					 Now the world attention is focused on large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills being staged by the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces on the peninsula.
					
					 Due to the exercises, typical north-targeted nuclear test war drill for making preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK, the sky, the land and seas of south Korea turned into theatres of war maneuvers for invading the north.
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, the south Korean puppet forces totally resumed the broadcasting for "psychological warfare against the north" under the pretext of the suspicious "mine explosion" that occurred in the demilitarized zone in the western sector of the front on August 4, forcibly linking the case with the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet military gangsters continue the said broadcasting day and night on the whole front and, at the same time, are carrying out the "operation of scattering leaflets toward the north" with the mobilization of wicked reactionary organizations.
					
					 Those acts have recently become more intensified than the past period in their scale and frequency to reach the extreme phase which can not be overlooked any longer.
					
					 The resumption of the broadcasting on the front is a wanton violation of the north-south military agreements, a grave military provocation against the DPRK and a crucial case pushing the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the puppet military warmongers fired 36 shells at KPA civil police posts under the pretext that the KPA fired one shell at the south side in the central western sector of the front on August 20.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in parallel with the broadcasting for psychological warfare while conducting the large-scale joint military maneuvers with the U.S. This means an undisguised advance into the state of war for aggression.
					
					 An emergency enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea was convened and the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army issued an order to cope with the prevailing dangerous situation. This is a historic measure to frustrate the vicious politically-motivated military provocation of the hostile forces aimed at undermining the political idea and social system of the DPRK, overturning its political power and putting all its territory under their control.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are hardening the strong will of retaliation upon the order of the KPA supreme commander.
					
					 The DPRK army is full of surging indignation at the puppet military's provocative saber-rattling and is high in the spirit of annihilating the enemy with its guns leveled at the means for psychological warfare, ready to completely destroy them through immediate military action.
					
					 The ultimatum issued by the General Staff of the Korean People's Army that a strong military action would be launched at once unless the south Korean puppet forces stop the anti-DPRK broadcasting for psychological warfare and remove all psywar means within 48 hours is not just a mere warning.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces should not act rashly just like a puppy knowing no fear of the tiger, but clearly understand the will of retaliation of the angered army of the DPRK and behave with discretion.
					
					 Those who pushed the situation to a catastrophic phase are bound to meet merciless retaliation.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Denounces North-targeted War by U.S. and Puppet Army
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Denounces North-targeted War by U.S. and Puppet Army
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Minjok Ilbo, a south Korean internet newspaper, in an editorial on August 17 condemned Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills by the U.S. imperialists and puppet warmongers.
					 The editorial branded the on-going drills as north-targeted war exercises aimed to occupy the north all at once after hurling huge nuclear weapons and up-to-date war hardware.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. and the south Korean authorities clearly understand the fatal aftermath to be caused by the exercises and stop the dangerous nuclear war drills against the north at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Suppresses Progressive Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Suppresses Progressive Organization
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The puppet group is running amuck in suppressing the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy, a progressive civic organization, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office made restraint complaint against two members of the executive board including the co-representative of the organization on the suspicion of "forming the organization profiting the enemy" on August 19.
					
					 The puppet group is desperately moving to stamp out progressive organizations and dampen the spirit for reunification through alliance with the north.

articles.title: Koreans' Organization Denounces UFG War Drills
articles.content:
Koreans' Organization Denounces UFG War Drills 
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China on Aug. 19 made public a statement in denunciation of the frantic U.S.-south Korea joint military drills Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) aimed at invasion of the DPRK. 
					 The statement said the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces launched the UFG from Aug. 17. 
					
					 The evermore escalating UFG year by year is the war drills aiming at invading the DPRK pursuant to the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward it and the south Korean puppet forces' moves for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China strongly urge the U.S. and south Korean authorities to immediately stop UFG mindful of the serious warning issued by the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand that the DPRK is the invincible power equipped with the most modern offensive and defensive means in the world including nuclear deterrence. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces responded to all the peaceful initiatives and proposals made by the DPRK out of good faith and generosity with extremely dangerous war drills. Their traitorous war hysteria against reunification and peace is bound to meet the unanimous rejection and denunciation by the whole Korean nation.

articles.title: Joint Photo Exhibition "History of Friendship" Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Joint Photo Exhibition "History of Friendship" Opens in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition on the theme of "history of friendship" was opened in Vladivostok, Russia on Aug. 14 under the co-sponsorship of the Maritime Territorial branch of the United Russia Party and the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka, Russia on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's visit to the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed on the front wall of the venue of the exhibition were photos of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il during their visits to the Soviet Union and Russia among Kimilsungias. 
					
					 On display there were photos dealing with the feats performed by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the DPRK and handcrafts associated with creative talents of the Korean people. 
					
					 Speeches were made at an opening ceremony.
					
					 The chairman of the Maritime Territorial Legislative Assembly said that the joint photo exhibition was an important occasion for promoting the development of bilateral relations.
					
					 He said that photos and films helped him to know once again the feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed for the development of friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 He was pleased that the Russia-DPRK relations are developing on good terms under the deep care of Kim Jong Un and expressed his will to make positive efforts to expand cooperation with the DPRK in the future, too.
					
					 The deputy-secretary of the Regional Political Council of the Maritime Territorial branch of the United Russia Party stressed the need to make efforts to respect and carry forward the tradition of friendship provided by the preceding leaders of the two countries.
					
					 Then, there was a performance given by students of Russia and the show of a film on the history between the two countries.

articles.title: Round-Table Talks for Celebrating DPRK's Important Day Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Round-Table Talks for Celebrating DPRK's Important Day Held in Foreign Countries
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place at the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and a company of Indonesia, in Cabinda Province of Angola and at an Ethiopian enterprise on Aug. 10 and 11 to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The organizational secretary of the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association said that August 15 is a historic day when President Kim Il Sung led to victory the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle, thus liberating Korea. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President built Korea into a genuine people's country after the liberation.
					
					 Today Korea is the only one where such genuine people-oriented policies as the system of free education and free medical care are fully introduced, and the world progressive people envy the Korean people who enjoy full genuine political rights. 
					
					 An official of Cabinda Province of Angola said that the President defeated the strong Japanese imperialists, achieved a historic cause of national liberation and turned Korea into a dignified socialist power.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
						
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Meetings, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place in Norway, Sweden, Finland and Malaysia on Aug. 14 and 15 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos dealing with feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display were their works, and photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Kimilsungia".
					
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, said that Korea's liberation was a historic event that heralded the start of independent, prosperous and new Korea.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, said that Korea's liberation was a great and historic victory made by the Korean people in the national liberation struggle in colonies.
					
					 Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, highly praised feats performed by Kim Il Sung who embarked on the road of struggle to save the country and the nation in his teens, founded the Juche idea, achieved the historic cause of the country's liberation and built a powerful socialist country centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Norway, Sweden and Finland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kim Kun Ha
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kim Kun Ha
						
　Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 20 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kim Kun Ha, condecorado con la Orden Kim Il Sung, ex trabajador politico de la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a reelecto presidente de Burundi
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a reelecto presidente de Burundi
						
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam. envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion al reelecto presidente de la Republica de Burundi, Pierre Nkurunziza.
					Convencido de que se fortalezcan y se desarrollen mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Burundi, el remitente formula votos al destinatario por los exitos en sus responsables trabajos para la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales.

articles.title: Convocada reunion ampliada de emergencia de CMC del PTC
articles.content:
Convocada reunion ampliada de emergencia de CMC del PTC
						
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- En estos dias, debido a las incesantes provocaciones politico-militares de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la situacion del pais se lleva al borde de la guerra.
					Continua de dia a noche la radioemision psicologica de los gangsteres militares surcoreanos contra la RPDC, reanudada en todo el frente so pretexto del caso de la sospechosa "explosion de mina" surgida el dia 4 en la zona desmilitarizada de la parte occidental del frente y llega a tal punto que ya no se puede cometer ni una negligencia mas la cruel operacion de lanzamiento de volantes contra la RPDC que se desarrolla movilizando las entidades reaccionarias.
					
					La guerra psicologica contra la RPDC es en su esencia un abierto acto de guerra de agresion a esta.
					
					Al respecto, el Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea envio al Ministerio titere de Defensa Nacional el ultimatum de que pasara a la fuerte accion militar si no se interrumpe dentro de 48 horas la radioemision psicologica anti-RPDC ni se retiren todos los medios psicologicos.
					
					A pesar de esto, los gangsteres de la capa militar surcoreana, enloquecidos en la provocacion contra la RPDC, volvieron a inventar inexistente caso de "disparo del proyectil del Norte de Corea" y tomandolo como pretexto cometieron una imprudente locura militar de disparar en la tarde del dia 20 de agosto del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche decenas de proyectiles hacia el sagrado territorio de la RPDC.
					
					Tales provocaciones politico-militares de los gangsteres militares surcoreanos que se desarrollan imprudentemente ante nuestros ojos, llevan la situacion del pais a la fase critica del estallido.
					
					En relacion con esta grave situacion creada, fue convocada a la noche del dia 20 una reunion ampliada de emergencia de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del EPC, dirigio la reunion.
					
					A la reunion asistieron los miembros del CMC del PTC, los miembros de mando operacional del EMG del EPC, los jefes de las grandes unidades combinadas del frente del EPC, los funcionarios dirigentes de los organos del Ministerio de Seguridad Estatal, el Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo y el CC del PTC y los funcionarios de la rama de asuntos exteriores.
					
					La reunion ampliada de emergencia de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea escucho el informe de la Direccion General de Reconocimiento del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea sobre el proceso y la verdad de los actos de provocacion militar de los enemigos producidos el dia 20 por la tarde en las zonas central y occidental del frente y la situacion general de enemigos.
					
					Tambien, reviso el estado preparativo hasta las 23 del dia 20 de las grandes unidades combinadas del frente del EPC para entrar en las operaciones y fueron discutidos los planes de enfrentamiento politico-militar para aplastar las maniobras de provocacion de guerra de los enemigos. Y fue examinado y firmado el plan operacional de ataque de la Comandancia del Frente del EPC para pasar a la vez a la contragolpe, contraataque, en todo el frente segun la situacion inevitable.
					
					Tambien, la CMC del PTC aprobo la decision del Estado Mayor General del EPC que envio a las 17 del dia 20 el ultimatum al Ministerio de Defensa titere surcoreano segun el cual pasara a los fuertes actos militares si no interrumpe dentro de las 48 horas la radiodifusion psicologica al Norte ni retire todos los medios de guerra psicologica.
					
					En la reunion ampliada de emergencia, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un dio la orden del Comandante Supremo del EPC de que las grandes unidades combinadas del frente del EPC pasaran al estado de guerra armado por completo que posibilita la entrada en la operacion inesperada y de declarar el estado de preguerra en las zonas del frente.
					
					Fueron nombrados y enviados de manera urgente a los frentes correspondientes los comandantes para dirigir las acciones militares para disparar y destruir los medios de guerra psicologica y las operaciones militares de las regiones para aplastar las reacciones de los enemigos si estos no interrumpen dentro de las 48 horas la radiodifusion psicologica.
					
					Y fueron discutidos los problemas de medidas para convertir en el sistema de preguerra todas las unidades de las zonas correspondientes incluyendo los organos del partido y del Poder, las organizaciones de masas, las instituciones de la defensa de seguridad y la seguridad del pueblo, la justicia y la fiscalia, las fabricas, las empresas y las granjas cooperativas conforme a la declaracion del estado de preguerra en las zonas del frente.
					
					Tambien, fueron presentados los deberes y las tareas de los funcionarios del dominio de asuntos exteriores para revelar los detalles de los verdaderos aspectos de la presente situacion creada por la abierta e inesperada agresion de los enemigos.

articles.title: Es irreparable la situacion llegada al borde de guerra, insiste MINREX de RPDC
articles.content:
Es irreparable la situacion llegada al borde de guerra, insiste MINREX de RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- Como ya transcendido, el pasado dia 20, los titeres surcoreanos volvieron a perpetrar en alrededores de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar la peligrosa provocacion militar lanzando decenas de proyectiles hacia la zona de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 21 una declaracion que senala como sigue:
					
					En relacion con el presente incidente, los titeres surcoreanos dicen ruidosamente de que emprendieron el fuego de respuesta a la RPDC que fue primero en disparar un proyectil. Pero, esta insistencia de la parte surcoreana es una pura mentira y fraudulenta.
					
					Ese dia, nuestra parte no tiro ni un proyectil ni una bala hacia la parte enemiga ni tampoco hubo un disparo accidental.
					
					El canonazo perpetrado unilateralmente por los titeres surcoreanos no es casual ni accidental, sino es una provocacion inventada y calculada bien por ellos mismos.
					
					Es el metodo rutinario de los mandatarios surcoreanos precedentes que cada vez que se caen en la crisis trataron de buscar la salida en la fabricacion de un incidente sensacional en el alrededor de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar para inducir al otro la vista del exterior e interior del pais.
					
					El presente caso tambien constituye una abierta provocacion intrigante para descansar un momento saliendo de la crisis e poner obstaculos en la fiesta del otro exacerbando al maximo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Los enemigos inventaron antes que todo el caso de la "explosion de la mina" en la Linea de Demarcacion Militar y tomandolo como pretexto reanudaron la radiodifusion psicologica contra la RPDC para incitarla al maximo. Y desarrollaron junto con EE.UU. los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura creando asi un ambiente psicologica necesario para que la sociedad internacional pensara como si la RPDC fuera primero en el disparo. Y despues cometieron el canonazo embelleciendolo como un "fuego de respuesta".
					
					Pero, ellos equivocaron gravemente.
					
					Cayeron en la trampa puesta por si mismos.
					
					El Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea ya envio a las 17 del 20 de agosto al Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea el ultimatum de que pasara a la fuerte accion militar si no se interrumpe dentro de 48 horas la radioemision psicologica anti-RPDC ni se retiren todos los medios psicologicos.
					
					La Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea aprobo la decision del EMG del EPC que envio el ultimatum al Ministerio de Defensa titere surcoreano tras examinar y firmar el plan operacional de ataque de la Comandancia del Frente del EPC para pasar a la vez al contragolpe, contraataque, en todo el frente segun la situacion inevitable.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un dio la orden del Comandante Supremo del EPC de que las grandes unidades combinadas del frente del EPC pasaran al estado de guerra armado por completo que posibilita la entrada en la operacion inesperada y de declarar el estado de preguerra en las zonas del frente.
					
					Ya es irreparable la situacion que se llego al borde de la guerra.
					
					Vinimos conteniendonos durante decenas de anos.
					
					Ahora, cualquier palabreria de continencia de alguien no puede ayudar mas al control de la situacion.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC estan decididos de hacer hasta la guerra total para defender a riesgo de la vida el regimen optado por si mismos sin recurrir en un simple enfrentamiento o represalia.

articles.title: Informan de situacion peligrosa a representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales
articles.content:
Informan de situacion peligrosa a representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales
						
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 21 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto de informacion emergente sobre la situacion peligrosisima creada en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					A la ocasion asistieron los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, los agregados militares y los miembros de las embajadas acreditados en la RPDC y los corresponsales de las agencias noticieras extranjeras.
					
					El general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Kim Yong Chol, subjefe del Estado Mayor General y director general de Reconocimiento, del EPC, informo de que la situacion de Corea se llega al borde de la guerra debido a las incesantes provocaciones politico-militares anti-RPDC de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres del Sur de Corea y de los verdaderos aspectos de los absurdos alborotos intrigantes de los enemigos.
					
					Revelo que en el mes en curso en que bajo la instigacion de su amo norteamericano se recrudecen mas las provocaciones de los titeres surcoreanos contra la RPDC, los belicistas de la capa militar titere del Sur de Corea inventaron el dia 20 por la tarde un incidente del "lanzamiento de proyectil del Norte de Corea" y tomandolo como pretexto cometieron peligrosa provocacion militar de disparar los 36 proyectiles hacia los puestos de policia civil del EPC.
					
					Revelo con datos el hecho de que el caso del "lanzamiento de proyectil del Norte de Corea" es una intriga absurda y falsedad.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos inventaron el caso de la "explosion de mina" como la "provocacion del Norte de Corea" para imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de haber creado la fase tensa en las actuales relaciones intercoreanas y preparar el pretexto para justificar la confrontacion fratricida inclusive el lanzamiento de volantes anti-RPDC.
					
					Denuncio la guerra psicologica anti-RPDC calificandola de un acto mas abierto de guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					Recordo que en relacion con la peligrosa situacion creada, fue convocada en la noche del dia 20 la reunion ampliada emergente de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y se dio la orden del Comandante Supremo del EPC de que las grandes unidades combinadas del frente del EPC pasaran desde las 17 del dia 21 al estado de guerra armado por completo que posibilita la entrada en la operacion inesperada y de declarar el estado de preguerra en las zonas del frente.
					
					Advirtio a los enemigos que su imprudente locura provocativa no evitara sin falta el castigo durisimo.
					
					Enfatizo en que el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea mantienen aguda vigilancia a las incesantes e imprudentes locuras conflictivas de los provocadores.
					
					Los imperialistas yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia al ver correctamente la realidad, aconsejo y declaro que el mundo vera claramente como el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea frustran las maniobras conflictivas anti-RPDC de los provocadores.
